医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
联合国儿童基金会紧急招标采购mpox疫苗联合国儿童基金会今天宣布，已针对采购 MPOX 疫苗进行紧急招标。疫苗可以在遏制 MPOX 疫情方面发挥关键作用，非洲疾病控制和预防中心 (Africa CDC) 和世界卫生组织 (WHO) 均宣布该疫情为突发公共卫生事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/UNICEF-issues-emergency-tender-for-mpox-vaccine-procurement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/UNICEF-issues-emergency-tender-for-mpox-vaccine-procurement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4efcec9f-e71f-4fb5-955f-34fdf1c05b32 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:31:22 -0400 UNICEF issues emergency tender for mpox vaccine procurement
在常见牙菌斑细菌中发现非凡的细胞分裂机制地球上最多样化的生态系统之一比您想象的更近 -；就在你的嘴里。您的口腔是一个繁荣的生态系统，由 500 多种不同种类的细菌组成，这些细菌生活在独特的、结构化的群落（称为生物膜）中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Extraordinary-cell-division-mechanism-discovered-in-common-dental-plaque-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Extraordinary-cell-division-mechanism-discovered-in-common-dental-plaque-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dcb0a75-953d-4a25-9ccc-2d021cf5028c Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:27:03 -0400 Extraordinary cell division mechanism discovered in common dental plaque bacteria
神经电路为更好的人工智能匹配解决方案提供线索当您要求拼车应用程序为您找到汽车时，该公司的计算机就会开始工作。他们知道您想快速到达目的地。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Neural- Circuits-provide-clues-for-better-AI-matching-solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Neural- Circuits-provide-clues-for-better-AI-matching-solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20913104-917d-4013-be26-475c267d7a78 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:24:46 -0400 Neural circuits provide clues for better AI matching solutions
克隆性造血驱动中年成人股动脉粥样硬化研究人员发现，克隆造血（CH）显着增加发生股动脉粥样硬化的风险，表明与传统心血管危险因素无关的单向关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Clonal-hematopoiesis-drives-femoral-atherosclerosis-in-middle-ages-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Clonal-hematopoiesis-drives-femoral-atherosclerosis-in-middle-ages-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fc7be60-2ab2-4b38-a0a7-07aabcaefc46 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:03:00 -0400 Clonal hematopoiesis drives femoral atherosclerosis in middle-aged adults
研究称美国媒体对 COVID-19 治疗的报道缺乏科学严谨性JMIR Infodemiology 的一项研究揭示了美国媒体对早期 COVID-19 疗法的报道往往缺乏科学证据并强调不确定性，从而导致错误信息和公众不信任。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/COVID-19-treatment-reporting-in-US-media-lacked-scientific-rigor-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/COVID-19-treatment-reporting-in-US-media-lacked-scientific-rigor-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66669c28-567a-4978-ab9e-bfcbf43ea44c Mon, 02 Sep 2024 21:32:00 -0400 COVID-19 treatment reporting in U.S. media lacked scientific rigor, study says
全球精神疾病风险与商业因素相关伞式审查确定了吸烟、饮酒、超加工食品和社交媒体使用等商业因素如何对不同人群的精神疾病和自杀行为产生重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Global-mental-illness-risks-linked-to-commercial-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Global-mental-illness-risks-linked-to-commercial-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5d17af1-3c6a-4556-abf6-159b22c906e7 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 21:14:00 -0400 Global mental illness risks linked to commercial factors
抹茶绿茶可增强老年人的认知和睡眠经常饮用抹茶绿茶可以改善认知能力下降的老年人的情绪感知和睡眠质量，尽管它对更广泛的认知功能没有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Matcha-green-tea-enhances-cognition-and-sleep-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Matcha-green-tea-enhances-cognition-and-sleep-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c17d2046-d5ff-4dd7-9dcb-1311443fc911 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 20:06:00 -0400 Matcha green tea enhances cognition and sleep in older adults
长期新冠肺炎症状严重程度因年龄、性别和社会经济地位而异研究通过医疗保健应用程序分析了自我报告的长期新冠症状，结果表明，症状严重程度因年龄、性别、种族、教育和社会经济地位等人口因素而存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Long-COVID-symptom-severity-varies-widely-by-age-gender-and-socioeconomic-status.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Long-COVID-symptom-severity-varies-widely-by-age-gender-and-socioeconomic-status.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b391ddf1-8f2a-4bac-aad7-43d0d1b46d61 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 19:32:00 -0400 Long COVID symptom severity varies widely by age, gender, and socioeconomic status
禁食和地中海饮食等饮食模式揭示了健康衰老的分子秘密研究回顾了热量限制、间歇性禁食、地中海饮食和生酮饮食促进健康衰老的分子机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Dietary-patterns-like-fasting-and-the-Mediterranean-diet-unlock-molecular-secrets-to-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Dietary-patterns-like-fasting-and-the-Mediterranean-diet-unlock-molecular-secrets-to-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f16ca866-2d0a-4a48-8de9-d6d5cf9e7398 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 19:17:00 -0400 Dietary patterns like fasting and the Mediterranean diet unlock molecular secrets to healthy aging
FINEARTS-HF 试验显示 Finerenone 对射血分数保留的心力衰竭有益根据今天在 ESC 2024 年大会热线会议上公布的最新研究成果，Finerenone 可减少心力衰竭 (HF) 和射血分数轻度降低 (HFmrEF) 或保留射血分数 (HFpEF) 患者的心力衰竭 (HF) 事件和心血管死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/FINEARTS-HF-Trial-shows-finerenone-benefits-for-heart-failure-with-preserved-ejection-fraction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/FINEARTS-HF-Trial-shows-finerenone-benefits-for-heart-failure-with-preserved-ejection-fraction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f619b18-a684-4399-b209-f919d0cd9c76 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 14:27:45 -0400 FINEARTS-HF trial shows finerenone benefits for heart failure with preserved ejection fraction
